result.execSummary:
The defendant Lamar C. Davis was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case.

  • Possession of THC (2nd+ Offense), a class I felony, Wisconsin Statutes 961.41(3g)(e).

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

records.addlTxt: Defendant's pro-se request to leave state to attend AODA classes in IL--GRANTED
modified to zero - commitment served 01/05/16 - copy filed 01/06/16

Defendant Lamar C. Davis in court with attorney Kristine A. Peshek.  Richard Jay Sullivan appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Guilty plea, Court finds defendant guilty.  PSI WAIVED.  Court orders 60 days Rock Co Jail with Huber and diversion; call by 10-20-15, report by 12-29-15; 3 days sentence credit; $518 costs due by 12-17-2015.
Defendant Lamar C. Davis in court with attorney Kristine A. Peshek.  Cheniqua White appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Plea/sentencing hearing scheduled for October 15, 2015 at 01:30 pm.

Defendant Lamar C. Davis in court with attorney Kristine A. Peshek.  Cheniqua White appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Right to Jury Trial waived by Defendant freely and voluntarily; State consent.  Calendar call scheduled for September 24, 2015 at 01:30 pm.

Defendant Lamar C. Davis in court with attorney Kristine A. Peshek.  Richard Jay Sullivan and intern Christa Johnson appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Plea/sentencing hearing scheduled for August 6, 2015 at 01:30 pm.

Defendant Lamar C. Davis in court with attorney Kristine A. Peshek.  Katharine Buker and intern Christa Johnson appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Calendar call scheduled for July 9, 2015 at 01:30 pm.
Attorney Kristine A. Peshek in court.  Cheniqua White appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Calendar call scheduled for June 4, 2015 at 01:30 pm.

Defendant Lamar C. Davis in court with attorney Kristine A. Peshek.  Gerald Anthony Urbik appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Information filed, copy to Defendant, reading waived.  Not guilty plea.  Calendar call scheduled for May 7, 2015 at 01:30 pm.

Defendant Lamar C. Davis in court with attorney Kristine A. Peshek.  Jodi Dabson Bollendorf appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Defendant waives preliminary hearing freely and voluntarily.  Court accepts waiver and binds the Defendant over for the filing of an Information.  Arraignment scheduled for March 31, 2015 at 01:15 pm.

Defendant Lamar C. Davis in court in custody with attorney Sean Drury.  Mary Elizabeth Bricco appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Complaint filed, copy to Defendant, penalties advised, rights given, reading waived.  Adjourned initial appearance scheduled for March 17, 2015, at 10:00 am.
